creator: rob@apgood.com
text: I have installed both the SSL and non-SSL binaries being distributed for version 2.2.13.  When tasked to process s simple login PHP script, httpd.exe aborts by instruction located at 0x019a2072 referencing memory at 0x00000000.  I have duplicated problem consistently.

creator: nick@webthing.com
text:
It looks as if your PHP is not compatible with your HTTPD build.  But we don't support PHP here, nor can we fix crashes in PHP apps.

If you have this kind of problem, you might do best to install one of the third-party complete packages, such as those available from ApacheLounge or ApacheFriends.

creator: poirier@pobox.com
text: Still invalid, see Nick's earlier comments and helpful suggestions for how to get your problem solved.
